sql-queryset.name: FRAMEWORK_V2
sql-queryset.sql-query: select PROPERTY_NAME, PROPERTY_VALUE, LOCALE_CODE from GLOBAL_LOCALIZED_PROPERTY
INSERT INTO GLOBAL_LOCALIZED_PROPERTY (PROPERTY_NAME, PROPERTY_VALUE, LOCALE_CODE) VALUES (? ,?, ?)
DELETE FROM GLOBAL_LOCALIZED_PROPERTY WHERE PROPERTY_NAME LIKE ? AND LOCALE_CODE LIKE ?
UPDATE GLOBAL_LOCALIZED_PROPERTY SET PROPERTY_VALUE=? WHERE PROPERTY_NAME=? AND LOCALE_CODE=?
select PROPERTY_NAME, PROPERTY_VALUE from GLOBAL_PROPERTY
INSERT INTO GLOBAL_PROPERTY (PROPERTY_NAME, PROPERTY_VALUE) VALUES (? ,?)
DELETE FROM GLOBAL_PROPERTY WHERE PROPERTY_NAME LIKE ?
UPDATE GLOBAL_PROPERTY SET PROPERTY_VALUE=? WHERE PROPERTY_NAME=?
INSERT INTO PLUGIN_DATA (PLUGIN_ID, NAME, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO PLUGIN_DATA (PLUGIN_ID, NAME, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, data) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
DELETE FROM PLUGIN_DATA WHERE PLUGIN_ID = ?

sql-query.name: DELETE_PLUGIN_BY_NAME
sql-query.comment: 플러그인 이름에 해당하는 플러그인 데이터 삭제

sql-queryset.sql-query: DELETE FROM PLUGIN_DATA WHERE NAME = ?
SELECT PLUGIN_ID, NAME, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM PLUGIN_DATA WHERE NAME = ?
SELECT PLUGIN_ID, NAME, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM PLUGIN_DATA
UPDATE PLUGIN_DATA SET DATA = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PLUGIN_ID = ?
SELECT DATA FROM PLUGIN_DATA WHERE PLUGIN_ID = ?
SELECT 1 FROM PLUGIN_DATA
SELECT SEQUENCER_ID, NAME, VALUE FROM SEQUENCER
SELECT VALUE FROM SEQUENCER WHERE SEQUENCER_ID = ?
UPDATE SEQUENCER SET VALUE = ? WHERE SEQUENCER_ID = ? AND VALUE = ?
SELECT MAX ( SEQUENCER_ID ) + 1 FROM SEQUENCER
INSERT INTO SEQUENCER (VALUE, NAME, SEQUENCER_ID ) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
SELECT COUNTRY_ID, NAME, A2, A3, NUM, DIAL, ENABLED FROM I18N_COUNTRY WHERE COUNTRY_ID = ?
SELECT COUNTRY_ID, NAME, A2, A3, NUM, DIAL, ENABLED FROM I18N_COUNTRY WHERE NAME = ?
SELECT COUNTRY_ID, NAME, A2, A3, NUM, DIAL, ENABLED FROM I18N_COUNTRY WHERE A2 = ?
SELECT COUNTRY_ID, NAME, A2, A3, NUM, DIAL, ENABLED FROM I18N_COUNTRY WHERE A3 = ?
SELECT COUNTRY_ID, NAME, A2, A3, NUM, DIAL, ENABLED FROM I18N_COUNTRY
SELECT COUNTRY_ID, NAME, A2, A3, NUM, DIAL, ENABLED FROM I18N_COUNTRY WHERE ENABLED = 1
SELECT count(COUNTRY_ID) FROM I18N_COUNTRY
SELECT count(COUNTRY_ID) FROM I18N_COUNTRY WHERE ENABLED = 1
DELETE FROM I18N_COUNTRY WHERE COUNTRY_ID = ?
UPDATE I18N_COUNTRY SET NAME = ?, A2 = ?, A3 = ?, NUM = ?, DIAL = ?, ENABLED = ? WHERE COUNTRY_ID = ?
INSERT INTO I18N_COUNTRY (COUNTRY_ID, NAME, A2, A3, NUM, DIAL, ENABLED ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO I18N_TEXT (TEXT_ID, LOCALE_CODE, TEXT_KEY, TEXT, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE I18N_TEXT SET TEXT = ? , MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE TEXT_ID = ?
DELETE FROM I18N_TEXT WHERE TEXT_ID = ?
SELECT TEXT_ID, LOCALE_CODE, TEXT_KEY, TEXT, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM I18N_TEXT WHERE TEXT_ID = ?
SELECT TEXT_ID, LOCALE_CODE, TEXT_KEY, TEXT, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM I18N_TEXT
SELECT TEXT_ID, LOCALE_CODE, TEXT_KEY, text, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM I18N_TEXT WHERE LOCALE_CODE = ?
SELECT count( LOCALE_ID ) FROM I18N_LOCALE
SELECT LOCALE_ID ,LANGUAGE, COUNTRY, VARIANT, ENCODING ,CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM I18N_LOCALE
SELECT LOCALE_ID ,LANGUAGE, COUNTRY, VARIANT, ENCODING ,CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM I18N_LOCALE WHERE LOCALE_ID = ?
SELECT LOCALE_ID ,LANGUAGE, COUNTRY, VARIANT, ENCODING ,CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM I18N_LOCALE WHERE LANGUAGE = ? AND COUNTRY = ?
INSERT INTO I18N_LOCALE ( LOCALE_ID ,LANGUAGE, COUNTRY, VARIANT, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM I18N_LOCALE WHERE LOCALE_ID = ?
UPDATE I18N_LOCALE SET ENCODING = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE LOCALE_ID = ? MODIFIED_DATE
